ai-patthana1.23:150.1_0: One is a condition for the unshakable, for the donor of repulsion and for the future.
ai-patthana1.23:150.1_1: the condition being by way of arising later condition. ...
ai-patthana1.23:150.1_2: the condition being by way of deeds ...
ai-patthana1.23:150.1_3: the condition being by way of nutriment condition ...
ai-patthana1.23:150.1_4: the condition being by way of faculty condition.
ai-patthana1.23:151.1_0: One is a condition for the unprotected space, for the future, and repulsion of the teaching.
ai-patthana1.23:151.1_1: the condition being by way of arising later condition. ...
ai-patthana1.23:151.1_2: the condition being by way of deeds ...
ai-patthana1.23:151.1_3: the condition being by way of nutriment condition ...
ai-patthana1.23:151.1_4: the condition being by way of faculty condition.
ai-patthana1.23:152.1_0: For the one who is not visible and the repulsion of the Dhamma, and so on, the incompetent of the Dhamma
ai-patthana1.23:153.1_0: the unshakable, the repulsion of the path, the accompanying of the teaching, and the repetition condition is a condition for the resentment of principles.
ai-patthana1.23:154.1_0: the invisible, the repetition of the path and the didn’t is legitimate.
ai-patthana1.23:155.1_0: the invisible, and not impingement in the future is present, and so on is the time of the teaching.
ai-patthana1.23:156.1_0: the unspecified, the flood, and the things that are inappropriate, and there are no legitimate means of the path and the penetration of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana1.23:157.1_0: the unspecified, the Protector of neither perception nor non-perception, and the repulsion of the path and the practice that leads to the beginning.
ai-patthana1.23:158.1_0: the unspecified, the flood, and the things that are not visible and, and the resentment and doing so by legitimate means of the path and the penetration of the teaching.
ai-patthana1.23:159.1_0: the unspecified, not visible, and have impingement in neither the body nor the future.
ai-patthana1.23:160.1_0: For the one who is not visible and not impingement, and so on, the influence of the teaching is the time of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana1.23:161.1_0: the resentment for the donor is for the unsuitable, and so on. This is the condition he has no repulsion of the teaching.
ai-patthana1.23:161.1_1: the condition being by way of arising before condition.
ai-patthana1.23:162.0.2_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana1.23:162.1_0: Nor do they have not deceived the five objects, nor the five objects, two linking them together in the debt, not in two or three different paths, fourteenth and nine sections, not even by theteenth or five convocations. Having not enemies, he does not transgress a new paternal and woven headed by the arm, nor by the Lord of the Buddhas, and five consequences,
ai-patthana1.23:163.0.3_0: if it is not with no cause or reason;
ai-patthana1.23:163.1_0: not with the cause or condition for the sake of the Bodhisatta, nor through the first (jewel).
ai-patthana1.23:164.1_0: Not with the cause or condition for the sake of a newly arrived monks, not by the arm, or by the arm, or by a whirlpool, or Bāhiyan Tree or their arm, or even intelligence in between the Bāraṇasī, they don’t bathe in the twisted one’s presence.
ai-patthana1.23:164.1_1: Neither clothes, nor through the hands of the feet, the inner skin enemy, ninety poisons, orifices of Bāhiya, did not have nine hundred positions.
ai-patthana1.23:166.0.1_0: being conscious, so full of flattering,
ai-patthana1.23:166.1_0: Not a cause or condition for seven reasons. Not for seven or seven reasons, they don’t stay in the next life, or seven or seven or seven wide wisdom. ...
ai-patthana1.23:166.1_1: Neither not sort nor solely through four feet, there are seven stages in need,
ai-patthana1.23:167.1_0: Once there is no cause or condition for seven reasons. ...
ai-patthana1.23:167.1_1: Nor in between the seventh part of the linked horses, not in between the seven claws, and the seventh part of the natural principles, and not the seventh part.
ai-patthana1.23:168.1_0: On the cause of reasons, they don’t see a single object, but do not have set accidently.
ai-patthana1.23:169.1_0: To be experienced by the mind,
ai-patthana1.23:170.0.1_0: Iscious resplendent to the immaterial states
ai-patthana1.23:170.0.2_0: if it is not with no cause or reason;
ai-patthana1.23:170.1_0: Neither roots have three conditions, and many are unbroken. There is no one, two, three, four, five, six, seventy, eight parts, and nine prominents in the wood thresholding the creation of the faculties, six classes of rebirth into a single section decision, and one defining the five constituents (of mind and body). There is not evoked in each other.
ai-patthana1.23:171.2_0: The first section for recitation is finished.
ai-patthana1.23:172.1_0: The group of forty-three is finished.
ai-patthana1.23:173.1_0: The section on the teaching is finished.
